Apple Scab.cure: Apply fungicides like Mancozeb, Myclobutanil, or Captan. Remove and destroy infected leaves.
Apple Scab.precaution: Prune infected branches, ensure good air circulation, and use resistant apple varieties.

Apple Black Rot.cure: Remove infected fruit and branches. Apply copper-based fungicides or Thiophanate-methyl.
Apple Black Rot.precaution: Avoid injuries to the tree, prune during dry conditions, and clean up fallen debris.

Apple Cedar Rust.cure: Apply fungicides like Propiconazole and Myclobutanil. Remove nearby junipers (alternative hosts).
Apple Cedar Rust.precaution: Plant resistant apple varieties, maintain tree health with proper fertilization.

Apple Healthy.precaution: Regular pruning, proper irrigation, and balanced fertilization.

Blueberry Healthy.precaution: Maintain soil acidity (pH 4.5-5.5), proper fertilization, and good irrigation.

Cherry Powdery Mildew.cure: Apply sulfur-based fungicides, potassium bicarbonate, or neem oil.
Cherry Powdery Mildew.precaution: Improve air circulation, avoid excessive nitrogen fertilizers, and prune regularly.

Cherry Healthy.precaution: Proper watering, soil management, and disease-free planting materials.

Corn Cercospora Leaf Spot & Gray Leaf Sp.cure: Apply fungicides like Strobilurin or Azoxystrobin. Use crop rotation.
Corn Cercospora Leaf Spot & Gray Leaf Sp.precaution: Avoid excessive nitrogen application and ensure good field drainage.

Corn Common Rust.cure: Apply fungicides such as Triazole-based products (Propiconazole).
Corn Common Rust.precaution: Use resistant hybrids, avoid high humidity, and space plants properly.

Corn Northern Leaf Blight.cure: Use fungicides like Pyraclostrobin and Chlorothalonil.
Corn Northern Leaf Blight.precaution: Plant resistant varieties, ensure good air circulation, and remove crop residues.

Grape Black Rot.cure: Apply fungicides like Captan or Thiophanate-methyl. Prune infected parts.
Grape Black Rot.precaution: Remove mummified fruit, improve air circulation, and avoid overhead watering.

Grape Esca (Black Measles).cure: No effective chemical treatment. Remove and destroy infected vines.
Grape Esca (Black Measles).precaution: Improve drainage, avoid excessive pruning, and maintain soil health.

Grape Leaf Blight (Isariopsis Leaf Spot).precaution: Avoid excessive nitrogen fertilizers and overhead irrigation.

Grape Healthy.precaution: Regular pruning, balanced nutrition, and proper irrigation.

Orange Haunglongbing (Citrus Greening).cure: No cure. Infected trees should be removed immediately.
Orange Haunglongbing (Citrus Greening).precaution: Control psyllid population using insecticides, plant disease-resistant varieties.

Peach Bacterial Spot.precaution: Avoid excessive nitrogen, plant resistant varieties, prune in dry weather.

Peach Healthy.precaution: Maintain proper soil nutrients and avoid overhead irrigation.

Pepper Bell Bacterial Spot.cure: Apply copper-based fungicides and antibiotics like Streptomycin.
Pepper Bell Bacterial Spot.precaution: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead watering, and rotate crops.

Pepper Bell Healthy.precaution: Proper soil management and irrigation practices.

Potato Early Blight.cure: Use fungicides containing Chlorothalonil or Mancozeb.
Potato Early Blight.precaution: Avoid overwatering, ensure crop rotation, and remove infected leaves.

Potato Late Blight.cure: Apply fungicides like Metalaxyl or Mancozeb.
Potato Late Blight.precaution: Avoid overhead irrigation, use resistant varieties, and improve field drainage.

Potato Healthy.precaution: Maintain proper soil health and irrigation.

Soybean Healthy.precaution: Proper crop rotation and soil nutrition.

Squash Powdery Mildew.cure: Apply sulfur-based or potassium bicarbonate fungicides.
Squash Powdery Mildew.precaution: Ensure good air circulation, avoid over-fertilization.

Strawberry Leaf Scorch.cure: Use fungicides like Captan or Myclobutanil.
Strawberry Leaf Scorch.precaution: Avoid high nitrogen levels, prune infected leaves.

Strawberry Healthy.precaution: Maintain proper soil moisture and ventilation.

Tomato Bacterial Spot.cure: Apply copper fungicides and antibiotics like Streptomycin.
Tomato Bacterial Spot.precaution: Use disease-free seeds and avoid overhead watering.

Tomato Early Blight.cure: Use fungicides containing Chlorothalonil or Copper compounds.
Tomato Early Blight.precaution: Rotate crops and remove infected plant debris.

Tomato Late Blight.cure: Apply fungicides like Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil.
Tomato Late Blight.precaution: Improve ventilation and avoid overhead irrigation.

Tomato Leaf Mold.cure: Use fungicides like Chlorothalonil or Copper hydroxide.
Tomato Leaf Mold.precaution: Reduce humidity and space plants properly.

Tomato Septoria Leaf Spot.cure: Apply fungicides containing Copper or Chlorothalonil.
Tomato Septoria Leaf Spot.precaution: Avoid wet foliage, remove infected leaves.

Tomato Spider Mites (Two-Spotted Spider.cure: Use miticides like Abamectin or Neem oil.
Tomato Spider Mites (Two-Spotted Spider.precaution: Increase humidity and remove affected leaves.

Tomato Target Spot.precaution: Avoid excessive nitrogen and ensure proper drainage.

Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.precaution: Control whiteflies and use resistant varieties.

Tomato Mosaic Virus.precaution: Sanitize tools and avoid tobacco contamination.

Tomato Healthy.precaution: Maintain good soil health and irrigation.
